creator: sandy801@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 28174
ppt which has background image in slide 3.

When converting a ppt with background image to pdf, the generated pdf has image which is reduced in size and tiled.

What's wrong with POI ?
Was the attached file generated by POI, or you use POI to convert slides to pdf or what ? 

Yegor
creator: yegor@dinom.ru
sandy801@gmail.com
text: i acttualy create html from ppt and then pdf... so actually generated html comes from poi, which tiles the image.

creator: yegor@dinom.ru
text:
how do you convert ppt to html with POI? 

Yegor

> i acttualy create html from ppt and then pdf... so actually generated html
> comes from poi, which tiles the image.

creator: sandy801@gmail.com
text: My Bad, didn't check what was happening in code, actually I get image from PPT and generate html code based on that. looks like non issue at poi end.
